remarks: The limit of all preimage maps by the "lower than or equal" relation is the universe.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Feb-2017.)
statement:
dstfrv.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) $.
dstfrv.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) $.
dstfrvunirn $p |- ( ph -> U. ran ( n e. NN |-> ( X oRVC <_ n ) ) = U. dom P ) $.
$d P n $.
$d X n $.
$d n ph $.
